SELECT t.id, t.name, t.text, t.rarity, t.slot FROM token t, token_details td WHERE t.id = td.id
AND t.slot= 'MAINHAND' AND (td.range_wep = 1 OR td.thrown = 1)
AND td.shuriken = 1 AND td.range_wep = if((select shuriken FROM token_details WHERE id = (SELECT item_id FROM character_items where character_id = #{characterId} AND slot = 'RANGE_MAINHAND')) = 1, 1,0)
AND t.slot= 'OFFHAND' AND td.shield = if((select two_hand FROM token_details WHERE id = (SELECT item_id FROM character_items where character_id = #{characterId} AND slot = 'RANGE_MAINHAND')) = 1, 0,1) AND td.buckler = if((select two_hand FROM token_details WHERE id = (SELECT item_id FROM character_items where character_id = #{characterId} AND slot = 'RANGE_MAINHAND')) = 1, 1,0)
AND t.slot= 'MAINHAND' AND td.range_wep = 0 AND (td.one_hand = 1 OR td.two_hand = 1)
AND (td.ranger_off = 1 OR td.mug = 1) AND (t.slot= 'MAINHAND' OR t.slot= 'OFFHAND')
AND (td.monk_offhand = 1 OR td.mug = 1) AND (t.slot= 'MAINHAND' OR t.slot= 'OFFHAND')
AND t.slot= 'OFFHAND'
AND (td.one_hand = 1 OR td.shield = 1 OR td.mug = 1) AND td.range_wep = 0
AND t.rarity = 'COMMON'
AND t.rarity = 'UNCOMMON'
AND t.rarity = 'RARE'
AND t.rarity = 'ULTRARARE'
AND t.rarity IN ('ENHANCED','EXALTED','RELIC','LEGENDARY','ELDRITCH','PREMIUM','ARTIFACT')
AND t.barbarian = 1
AND t.bard = 1
AND t.cleric = 1
AND t.druid = 1
AND t.dwarf_fighter = 1
AND t.elf_wizard = 1
AND t.fighter = 1
AND t.wizard = 1
AND t.monk = 1
AND t.paladin = 1
AND t.ranger = 1
AND t.rogue = 1
ORDER BY t.name
